description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物、前记者，曾任中共云南省委宣传部副部长等职务。因其开通实名微博与网民互动而被称为'网红官员'，后因涉嫌违纪违法被查。
description.en: A Chinese political figure and former journalist who served as Deputy Director of the Propaganda Department of the Yunnan Provincial Committee of the CCP. He became known as an 'internet celebrity official' for opening a real-name Weibo account to interact with netizens, and was later investigated for suspected violations of discipline and law.

description.zh-cn: 中国顶尖的综合性研究型大学，位于北京市。
description.en: A major Chinese research university located in Beijing.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任中国共产党中央委员会总书记、中华人民共和国主席、中央军事委员会主席。
description.en: A Chinese politician who served as General Secretary of the Communist Party of China, President of the People's Republic of China, and Chairman of the Central Military Commission.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的国家通讯社。
description.en: The official state press agency of the People's Republic of China.

nodes.id: 西藏自治区党委办公厅

zh-cn: 西藏自治区党委办公厅

description.zh-cn: 指2009年发生在云南省晋宁县看守所的嫌疑人死亡事件，因警方声称其死于“躲猫猫”游戏而引发巨大争议和网络关注。
description.en: Refers to the death of a suspect in a detention center in Jinning County, Yunnan Province in 2009, which sparked significant controversy and online attention after police claimed he died during a game of 'hide-and-seek' (duo maomao).

location.zh-cn: 红河哈尼族彝族自治州
location.en: Honghe Hani and Yi Autonomous Prefecture

nodes.id: 云南省新闻出版广电局

zh-cn: 云南省新闻出版广电局

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的执政党。
description.en: The founding and ruling political party of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 就读于北京大学中文系。
description.en: Studied at the Department of Chinese Language and Literature, Peking University.

description.zh-cn: 伍皓在北大学生期间曾两次在中南海受到时任中共中央总书记江泽民接见。江泽民还为他起了藏名'扎西'。
description.en: During his time as a student at Peking University, Wu Hao was received twice by then-General Secretary Jiang Zemin at Zhongnanhai. Jiang also gave him the Tibetan name 'Tashi'.

position.en: Director of the Political and Cultural Office

relationships.target: 西藏自治区党委办公厅

position.en: Deputy Director of the Policy Research Office

position.zh-cn: 政文采访部主任、内刊编辑室主任、常务副总编辑
position.en: Director of the Political and Cultural News Department, Director of the Internal Publication Editorial Office, Executive Deputy Editor-in-Chief
Member of the Standing Committee, Director of the Propaganda Department

relationships.target: 云南省新闻出版广电局

description.zh-cn: 在云南晋宁“躲猫猫”事件中，时任云南省委宣传部副部长的伍皓因召集网友实地调查而知名，此举推动了事件的透明化处理。
description.en: During the 'Duo Maomao' incident in Jinning, Yunnan, Wu Hao, then Deputy Director of the Propaganda Department of the Yunnan Provincial Party Committee, gained prominence by inviting netizens to conduct an on-site investigation, which promoted a more transparent handling of the event.
